mapper.sql: rowid, STORE_CODE, STORE_NAME, ADDRESS, CONTACT_NAME, MOBILE, LON, LAT, SYS_CREATE_TIME, SYS_UPDATE_TIME, SYS_DELETE_TIME, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG
mapper.select: select STORE_CODE storeCode, STORE_NAME storeName FROM storehouse b WHERE b.SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = '1'
mapper.insert:

mapper.update:
update storehouse
STORE_CODE = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
STORE_NAME = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LON = #{lon,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR},
where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update storehouse set STORE_CODE = #{storeCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, STORE_NAME = #{storeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ADDRESS = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTACT_NAME = #{contactName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, MOBILE = #{mobile,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LON = #{lon,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, LAT = #{lat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYS_CREATE_TIME = #{sysCreateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_UPDATE_TIME = #{sysUpdateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_DELETE_TIME = #{sysDeleteTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, SYS_PROCESS_FLAG = #{sysProcessFlag,jdbcType=CHAR} where rowid = #{rowid,jdbcType=BIGINT}
